visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis should have categories 'Jan', 'Feb', and 'Mar', and the y-axis should display the sales data. The labels and titles should be styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px. The data series should include one series named 'Sales' with data [29.9, 71.5, 106.4]. Use custom colors for the series, specifically '#4CAF50' for the line color. Additionally, configure the chart to have a white background, a margin of 50 pixels on all sides, and a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with specific styling and data. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it has a white background with margins of 50 pixels on all sides. The title of the chart is 'Monthly Sales Data', styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px. The x-axis categories are 'Jan', 'Feb', and 'Mar', and the y-axis displays the sales data with a title 'Sales', both styled with the same dark gray color and font size. The data series includes one series named 'Sales' with data [29.9, 71.5, 106.4], and the line color is set to '#4CAF50'. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally.
